Points
"a" 0 1 1
"b" 0 0 1
"c" 1 0 1
"d" 1 1 1
"e" 0 1 0
"f" 0 0 0
"g" 1 0 0
"h" 1 1 0

Poly "cube" + 0 0 0 * 1 1 1
0 a b c
0 d a c
0 d c g
0 h d g 
0 a d h
0 e a h
0 b a f
0 a e f
0 c b f
0 g c f
0 f e g
0 e h g

PutPoly cube + 106 452 0 * 20 60 512
PutPoly cube + 106 0   0 * 20 418 512

PutPoly cube + 206 0 0  * 20 512 50
PutPoly cube + 206 0 84 * 20 512 428

End
